document_data.name: Wonders of Gond
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wonders of Gond''' was an impromptu [[:Category:Holidays|holiday]] that occurred in [[Neverwinter]] whenever the [[church of Gond]] arrived in town to offer encouragement to artisans, engineers, and crafters.{{Cite dragon+/14/Fiction: Prelude (Tomb of Annihilation)}}
document_data.Description: The timing of the holiday was unpredictable, but was said to occur whenever [[Gond]] determined that the city needed some encouragement. His [[cleric]]s would inspire and reward crafting of new objects and inventions. In particular, they encouraged the creation of toys, drinks, and intricate mechanical "doohickeys" designed to impress their [[god]].
document_data.History: During the year in which the [[death curse]] occurred,{{ToA-time}} the Wonders of Gond fell between [[Midsummer]] and [[Highharvestide]].
